casebody.data:
ZLOOP, INC.
v.
PARKER POE ADAMS & BERNSTEIN LLP, et al. 122P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 21, 2018 Gavin J. Reardon, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Amiel J. Rossabi, Attorney at Law, for Zloop, INC. Robert W. Fuller, Attorney at Law, Stuart L. Pratt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Parker Poe Adams & Bernstein, LLP, et al.

*253The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of May 2018 by Defendants for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of May 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 5th day of July, 2018 to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari.
